title: Five PhD positions available at SGBM, University of Freiburg, Germany
field: Botany and plant science, Developmental Biology, Immunology, Molecular Biology, Molecular Medicine, and 3 moreNeuroscience,Structural Biology,Virology
employer: Spemann Graduate School of Biology and Medicine (SGBM)
job_description:
Are you interested in pursuing your PhD within a structured, international and multidisciplinary program in one of the best Universities in Germany?

The Spemann Graduate School of Biology and Medicine (SGBM) at the University of Freiburg is currently recruiting 5 doctoral students in the following research disciplines:

Protein Structure and Function
Synthetic Biology and Signaling 
Neurosciences
Immunology/Virology
Molecular Medicine
Developmental Biology 
Molecular Plant Sciences

We offer:

  • a 3-year doctoral work contract
  • a high-profile research environment
  • an efficient supervision and mentoring program
  • courses in novel technologies and soft skills
  • an interdisciplinary teaching program
  • a campus in the center of the city with lecture rooms, social & guest rooms

We expect:

  • an excellent recent university degree: M.Sc. or German diploma (also candidates about to obtain such a degree are welcome to apply)
  • motivation and interest to join one of the interdisciplinary research areas of the Graduate School
  • excellent communication skills in English
  • interest and creativity to shape your own thesis project
  • interest in participating actively in the curricular and social activities of the school

You can find more information about the application procedure on the SGBM website www.sgbm.uni-freiburg.de (under âApplicationâ â Track 1). 

Important: please select the Track 1 radio button when you register!

The application deadline is March 3, 2022 (5:00 p.m. CET). 

Interviews will be held online on April 25-29, and decisions will be communicated to the candidates by May 10, 2022. Selected applicants will start the rotations on July 4, 2022.
